statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id < 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount, account_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING SUM(transaction_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_id = 5 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit'
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_type ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT requirement_id, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE is_met = FALSE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT description, is_met FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT requirement_id, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE is_met = false ORDER BY requirement_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_action = 'approved';
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, audit_timestamp FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT audit_action, audit_timestamp FROM transaction_audit WHERE auditor_id = 456 ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, user_id FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY requirement_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, audit_result FROM transaction_audit WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ft.id, ft.amount, ta.auditor_name FROM financial_transactions ft INNER JOIN transaction_audit ta ON ft.id = ta.transaction_id WHERE ta.audit_result = 'Failed';
SELECT tr.requirement_name, cr.review_date, cr.reviewer_name FROM regulatory_requirements tr INNER JOIN compliance_review cr ON tr.requirement_id = cr.audit_id ORDER BY cr.review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'complete';
SELECT audit_id, audit_details FROM transactions_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_date, status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT org_name, address FROM organizations WHERE org_name = 'ABC Inc'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, account_id FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
